description: Hello! I'm Mimi, MyBB's Discord Helper bot. I provide a variety of functions accessed via commands. Read the documentation below to find out how to get started.

fields.name: üìÑ !d, !doc and !docs
fields.value:
You can use the `!docs` command to find relevant help documentation pages from the MyBB Documentation site.

This command operates on a keyword system; so `!docs install` for example will bring up any help documents which we've pre-tagged with the `install` keyword.

Not sure what you're looking for? Try the `!docs list` command in order to get a list of keywords in my database.
```Usage: !docs <keyword> | !docs list
Example: !docs security```

fields.name: üíô !t and !team
fields.value:
You can view basic information about the team behind MyBB by using the `!team` command. This command attempts to make a decent guess at who you're trying to find and returns the data we have about them.
```Usage: !team <member>
Example: !team euan```
